name: Kuggs
description:
Kuggs is a fast-paced shooter with some light horror elements.
Fight off hordes of enemies and grow stronger over 70 levels. Can you defeat all of the bosses?

Features
  • Fun Mechanics
  • Unique Art Style
  • ASMR

-Choose one powerup (speed bonus, orb magnet, double ammo)
-Choose one bullet type (fire, frost, poison)
-Collect orbs to gain experience
-Level 1-70

Controls :
A - Left
D - Right
Space - boost upwards
Hold left mouse to fire.
R- return to main room
P- restart game
Esc - Exit



*menu and updates coming soon*



Made with Gamemaker Studio 2
